system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice. Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

As a General Internal Medicine Physicians with Ph.D., your work involves diagnose and provide nonsurgical treatment for a wide range of diseases and injuries of internal organ systems. provide care mainly for adults and adolescents, and are based primarily in an outpatient care setting.
